    • Field Detail

      • ANCHOR_POPUP_POSITION

        public static final Key<VisualPosition> ANCHOR_POPUP_POSITION
        Allows to get an editor position for which a popup with auxiliary information might be shown.

        Primary intention for this key is to hint popup position for the non-caret location.

      • ANCHOR_POPUP_POINT

        public static final Key<java.awt.Point> ANCHOR_POPUP_POINT
        If corresponding value is defined for an Editor, popups shown for the editor will be located at specified point. This allows to show popups for non-default locations (caret location is used by default).
        See Also:
        JBPopupFactory.guessBestPopupLocation(Editor)

      • guessBestPopupLocation

        public RelativePoint guessBestPopupLocation(DataContext dataContext)
        Description copied from class: JBPopupFactory
        Returns the location where a popup with the specified data context is displayed.
        Specified by:
        guessBestPopupLocation in class JBPopupFactory
        Parameters:
        dataContext - the data context from which the location is determined.
        Returns:
        location as close as possible to the action origin. Method has special handling of the following components:
        - caret offset for editor
        - current selected node for tree
        - current selected row for list

      • guessBestPopupLocation

        public RelativePoint guessBestPopupLocation(javax.swing.JComponent component)
        Specified by:
        guessBestPopupLocation in class JBPopupFactory

      • isBestPopupLocationVisible

        public boolean isBestPopupLocationVisible(Editor editor)
        Specified by:
        isBestPopupLocationVisible in class JBPopupFactory
        Parameters:
        editor - the editor over which the popup is shown.
        Returns:
        true if popup location is located in visible area false if center would be suggested instead
